title: Mecanorma Akhenaton sample?
content:
Wondering if anybody has a full sample of Akhenaton from Mecanorma?  
The typeface was created by G. Renevey but that is all I know...
author: jch02140

comments.content: I have a very small sample from Graphic Book 14 from Mecanorma, I could scan it later if you want it, but the letters are less than 1cm high, so it won't be the best quality. Full uppercase alphabet, numbers, punctuation, æ,œ, ø, $, £ and &.
That would be great, whyawhelk. Thanks in advance. :)
